title: Creature of the Gear
itunes:title: Creature of the Gear
description:
What is a gear and when did humans invent it? Plus, Rob and Joe discuss the only known creature to have gears in its anatomy. Plus hear about a couple of wheel-based mythical creatures in this episode of Stuff to Blow Your Mind.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
